title: Is it too late for April Fools conspiracies?
body:
Even though they have announced what they are doing tomorrow I'm still not convinced... I think Rito is up to something... something big. and green.

lets look at the facts... they "invited" us to a party in a lonely lane... 1742...
tomorrow is April first, or in my theory April One...
What was the biggest let down over the last year+ that would be the biggest surprise? 

My theory is that is it Ao Shin's Birthday party. April One... AO Shin... 1742... probably the year he was born... Lonely lane? what more lonely than farming in a jungle by yourself?

Rito will ditch all of the Urf-ery as a guise and come out with Ao Shin tomorrow even though we've been lead to believe he will probably not be released!

Ao Shin > Urf
